articles.author: Millie Sian, Harry Poole
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Naomi Osaka's jellyfish-inspired outfit steals show in win over Antonia Ruzic - BBC
articles.description: How Naomi Osaka's jellyfish-inspired outfit stole the show in her hard-fought Australian Open first-round win over Antonia Ruzic.
articles.content:
Naomi Osaka is known for serving jaw-dropping Grand Slam looks - but she took it to another level with a jellyfish-inspired outfit which made waves on day three of the Australian Open.
